controlnote.p: Lowell Thomas Papers - Graphic Material - Photographs - Glass Plate Negatives - Lowell Thomas - Indexed Photographs - Palestine

did.unittitle: Palestine

accessrestrict.p: Items in this collection do not circulate and may be used in-house only.

userestrict.p: Individuals requesting reproductions expressly assume the responsibility for compliance with all pertinent provisions of the Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. ss101 et seq. Patrons further agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Marist College Archives & Special Collections and its staff in connection with any disputes arising from the Copyright Act, over the reproduction of material at the request of patrons. For more information please visit the following website:Â http://www.loc.gov/copyright/title17/.
